Package votebox.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAnnounceEvent
    An IAnnounceEvent is an event that is generated by an announcement heard on the auditorium network.
    MatcherRule
    A MatcherRule checks to see if the given sexpression is a match, and then builds a corresponding event and returns it.
    VoteBoxEventListener
    A listener that handles various VoteBox message events on an auditorium network.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivatedEvent
    Event that represents the activated message:
    AssignLabelEvent
    Event that represents the assign-label message:
    AuthorizedToCastEvent
    Event that represents the authorized-to-cast message:
    AuthorizedToCastWithNIZKsEvent
    Event to authorize a VoteBox booth to cast using NZIKS (Non-interactive, zero-knowledge proofs)
    BallotCountedEvent
    Event that announces a counted ballot
    BallotPrintFailEvent  
    BallotPrintingEvent  
    BallotPrintSuccessEvent
    An event to signify that a ballot print has been successful
    BallotReceivedEvent
    Event that represents the ballot-received message:
    BallotScanAcceptedEvent
    This event confirms that a Supervisor has cast a ballot that a scanner has announced
    BallotScannedEvent
    Event class for when a ballot is scanned
    BallotScannerEvent
    Event that represents the ballotScanner message
    BallotScanRejectedEvent
    An event which signals that a scanned ballot was rejected, i.e.
    CastBallotUploadEvent
    Event representing uploading of cast ballots to post-election audit server These are cast ballots, so only ballot hashes are sent
    CastCommittedBallotEvent
    Event that represents the cast-ballot message:
    ChallengedBallotUploadEvent
    Event representing uploading of challenged ballots to post-election audit server These are challenged ballots, so both the ballot hashes and decrypted ballots are sent
    CommitBallotEvent
    This event represents what gets sent out on the network when the machine needs to commit to a cipher representation of the ballot.

    Format: (commit-ballot [nonce] [ballot])
    EncryptedCastBallotEvent
    An event resulting from the receipt of a encrypted-cast-ballot event.
    Form:
    (encrypted-cast-ballot [nonce] [ballot])
    Where [ballot] is in the form ((cand-#1-vote-race1 cand-#2-vote-race1) (cand-#1-vote-race2 ...)) with a whole message of E(...) thrown in.
    EncryptedCastBallotWithNIZKsEvent
    equivalent to EncryptedCastBallotEvent, however with functionality to deal with Non-Interactive, Zero-Knowledge proofs.
    InvalidPinEvent
    Event that says that a pin validation request was invalid
    JoinEvent
    An event that is fired whenever a connection to this machine is established, regardless of who initiated it.
    LastPollsOpenEvent
    Event that represents the last-polls-open message:
    LeaveEvent
    An event that is fired whenever a connection to another machine is lost.
    OverrideCancelConfirmEvent
    Event that represents the override-cancel-confirm message:
    OverrideCancelDenyEvent
    Event that represents the override-cancel-deny message:
    OverrideCancelEvent
    Event that represents the override-cancel message:
    OverrideCastConfirmEvent
    Event that represents the override-cast-confirm message:
    OverrideCastDenyEvent
    Event that represents the override-cast-deny message:
    OverrideCastEvent
    Event that represents the override-cast message:
    PINEnteredEvent
    Event class for when a pin is entered on a VoteBox.
    PollMachinesEvent
    Event that represents the polls-open message:
    PollsClosedEvent
    Event that represents the polls-closed message:
    PollsOpenEvent
    Event that represents the polls-open message:
    PollsOpenQEvent
    Event that represents the polls-open? message:
    PollStatusEvent
    An event that holds information about the polls, mainly whether or not the polls are currently open.
    ProvisionalAuthorizeEvent
    An event which sends a ballot to a votebox in a provisional voting session
    ProvisionalBallotEvent
    An event which represents that printing did not occur successfully
    ProvisionalCommitEvent
    An event which allows for unique handling of provionally committed ballots
    SpoilBallotEvent
    This is an event that gets fired when the supervisor spoils a voter's ballot
    StartScannerEvent  
    StatusEvent
    Event that represents the status message:
    SupervisorEvent
    Event that represents the supervisor message:
    TapMachineEvent  
    VoteBoxAuditoriumConnector
    The VoteBoxAuditoriumConnecter is the "middleman" that starts an instance of Auditorium, handles the VoteBox messaging protocol, and generates events to the application.
    VoteBoxEvent
    Event that represents the votebox message:
    VoteBoxEventMatcher
    A VoteBoxEventMatcher contains a list of rules to check messages against, and has a match method that performs this series of checks on the message.
    VoteBoxEventNotifier
    The VoteBoxEventNotifier can be treated as a VoteBoxEventListener, as it implements all of the methods.
